alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Sonoma Coastal Range; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast; Southern Salinas Valley, Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued February 24 at 9:55PM PST until February 25 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Marin Coastal Range, Coastal North Bay including Point Reyes National Seashore, Sonoma Coastal Range, North Bay Interior Mountains, San Francisco Bay Shoreline, East Bay Interior Valleys, East Bay Hills, Southern Salinas Valley including Arroyo Seco and Lake San Antonio,Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley, Carmel Valley, Northern Monterey Bay and Southern Monterey Bay including the Big Sur Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Cold temperatures will be hazardous to unsheltered or marginally sheltered populations. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
